text: Hi   Would like to have suggestions for after market blind spot monitoring system for Toyota Vios . Thanks
how does it work? the beep beep sound one ah?
Alot of modern cars have this function
Vim AutoAlex 8157 3455He got do blind spot mirror thingy
That's lane keep assist and lane departure warning
Different sensors at work for those
ok la....anything to improve on road safety right?
For manufacturer ones  there's usually an ultrasonic sensor in your C pillar that checks for cars in the Blindspot area like a higher parking sensor
And then you get a light on the mirror glass or inner side of the mirror housing for VAG cars
And you can have a beep warning on in case you start turning towards the car in the Blindspot
i rather get something to improve on my parking
